version_description: Fixes a bug where match details wouldn't load

Please make sure your player name is exactly as it is in the game when searching. Capitals must be in the correct place, it is a case sensitive search.

-Fixes a bug which caused a crash after the initial stats are loaded.
-Prevents accidental spaces at the end of player names when searching.

Added some nice features in this update!

- Ability to view friends recent matches.
- View the match details of any player/squad in a match (Tap on a squad from the leaderboard, or teammates names in the details).
- View any players career stats by tapping the player, then tap the profile icon at the top right in a match details view.
- Added FAQ section to the settings screen.
- Added hints and tips section to the settings screen.
- See where you finished in the kill place leaderboard by tapping the KILL PLACE stat
- Other bug fixes

Thanks for all the great feedback!

Nothing of note in this update, just bug fixes. Thanks for the all positive reviews.

Me and Dan have a lot more planned!

Another update!

This time we have easy region selection from a dropdown menu at the top right. Works for both your main account and friends accounts.

Also made some changes to the way data is stored to improve app load times and prevent freezes. If you experience a freeze, please email me: toml2003@hotmail.com

Keep hunting those chickens!

We're back again with another update!

- You can now view individual game mode stats and ratings for your friends or any player from a match.
- We have a donation page in the settings if you feel like making a donation to help keep the app up to date.
- Squashed a few bugs.
Just a couple bug fixes this time.
Updated for iOS 12.

- Support for War Mode matches on Xbox
- Added new Rank System for PC players
- Bug fixes

- Fixed the url for the API for PC players.
- Added support for October Season 2018 on Xbox for when PUBG switch the season over.

Update to apply new API changes.

If any issues still arise, please me email (toml2003@hotmail.com) or tweet @pubgstatsapp.

- Added support for PS4!
- Tidied up Xbox seasons.

Major new feature added in this update - 2D Replays. (Requires In App Purchase)

Included features:
• Full match replay with locations of all players
• Detail View showing items picked up and used
• Colour coded teams
• Bullet tracers and health of each player
• Kill feed
• Auto follow of main player
• Leaderboard with current knocks highlighted
• Fast scrub play head
• Fine scrub Detail View
• Adjustable playable speed
• Pinch to zoom

Also, other bug fixes included in this update.

- Season stats and lifetime stats are now combined in all regions. (This means you may find you have extra wins appear that were in a different region)

- New filter and sort for Recent Matches

- Added Vikendi to the 2D Replay feature

- Friends stats are now lifetime by default

- Tapping a player in a squad match switches the match view to their stats, then tapping the profile icon at the top right shows their career stats

Any issues please tweet me @pubgstatsapp. This is quite a bit change in the way the API works.

- New option in settings to choose between current season or lifetime stats as default for main account and friends accounts

- Added new Survival Title and Survival Points to game modes sections

- Added team kills and suicides for friends stats
- New compare stats screen added to friends and other players screens. Easily compare all stats with your friends, including separate seasons and game modes.

- Added crate drops to 2D Replays. Tap on them to view their contents.
- Other bugs fixes

I'm aware of issues with the 2D Replay crashing for iPhone 6 users. Looking in to making it more efficient for the iPhone 6.

- Added indicators to 2D Replays to show when players are in vehicles
- Updated Erangel map image
- Added MP5K icons and graphics to 2D Replay
- Added Flair Gun graphics to 2D Replay
- Added Spring Season 2019 for PC

- Attempted to fix 2D Replay failures on iPhone 6's

New in this update:

- Added direct link to PUBG.report for main account and friends accounts
- Added new follow blue zone to 2D Replays
- Added new path taken and path progress to 2D Replays

New in this update:

- Spring Season 2019 support for Xbox and PS4.

- Added direct link to PUBG.report for main account and friends accounts
- Added new follow blue zone to 2D Replays
- Added new path taken and path progress to 2D Replays

Had to release an update quick to fix recent matches appearing all wrong. This update fixes that but those effected matches will still be broken. To fix it, the best thing to do is to go to the settings in the app, tap on "change default player", then just tap Save. It'll reload your recent matches correctly.

Also, in this update:

- Landscape is now available for PUBG Report videos
- Added damage to match list view

In the next update, I plan to add the ability to view a list of players you killed in a match, with a link to their career stats.

- Added a new kill log feature which shows details of your gun fights for the kills you get in a match. Easily check the career stats of the enemies you've killed by tapping their name.

- Added a shortcut to the leaderboards in match detail views by tapping your rank position.

- Added a shortcut to squad members career stats by long pressing their names in the match details view.

- Support for the new Summer Season 2019
- Added Deagle to 2D Replay
- Updated Remastered Erangel Map in 2D Replay

Hi chicken chasers,

In this update I've added a new squads overview screen and leaderboard view to match details.

- Easily see who in your squad is dealing the most damage with distribution charts
- Quickly read who how many kills, assists, and knocks each team member got
- Discover who survived the longest and won the chicken dinner
- Tap on any squad in the list to view their stats seemlessly

Tom
